name: 廖克陽
objective:
各種冷凍空調用熱交換器之介紹，熱交換器應用分析，熱交換增強簡介，鰭電分析，熱交換效率分析及熱交換器結垢問題分析。
Introduction to the heat exchangers used in HVAC & R, application of heat exchangers, heat exchange enhancement analysis, fin analysis, heat exchange efficiency analysis, and discussion on fouling of heat exchangers.
schedule:
1.　　基本工程數學、熱力、流力、熱傳與熱交換器基礎簡介
Introduction to Advanced Engineering Mathematics、Thermodynamics、Heat Transfer & Fluid Mechanical to Heat Exchanger (1 Week)
2.　　熱交換器設計導論
Fundamentals of Heat Exchanger Design (3 Week)
3.　　密集式熱交換器
Compact Heat Exchanger (1 Week)
4.　　基本兩相熱流特性簡介
Introduction to Two-Phase flow (4Week)
5.　　冷凝器、蒸發器兩相熱交換器之設計
Designs of condenser and evaporator heat exchanger (1 Week)
6.　　各種幾何變數、殼管式熱交換器之計算法
Calculation method to Various geometric variables & Shell and tube heat exchanger (2 Week)
7.　　強化熱傳表面、鰭片管、積垢之問題與對策
Problems and Countermeasures to Enhanced heat transfer surface area、Fin tube and Fouling (1 Week)
8.　　熱交換器實務應用：冷卻水塔、冰水主機
Heat Exchanger Practical Application :  Cooling Tower and Chiller (1 Week)
9.　　熱交換器實務應用：熱管
Heat Exchanger Practical Application :  Heat Pipe (1 Week)
10.　　熱交換器之性能佳化、節能與經濟實務評估方法
 Practical concerns to Optimization of performance、energy saving、cost and economy of Heat 
 Exchanger (2 Week)
scorePolicy:
期中考 (40%) + 作業 (10%) + 課程參與 (10%) + 學期報告 (40%) 
註：作業須於規定期限內繳交。逾期三週以內者以所得成績之 80% 計算；逾期三週以上者以零分計算。
materials:
自編講義 (基本工程數學、熱力、流力、熱傳與熱交換器基礎原理)
自行收集編輯整理之熱交換設計之相關技術文件資料
王啟川，「熱交換設計」，五南圖書出版公司，民國九十六年。(第一章至第四章)
